    • setHardcore

      public static void setHardcore(boolean hardcore)
      Sets if the hardcore health bar should be displayed. This currently does not send an update to the player.
      Parameters:
      hardcore - if the hardcore health bar should be displayed

    • isHardcore

      public static boolean isHardcore()
      Gets if the player has the hardcore health bar.
      Returns:
      true if the player hardcore health bar, false otherwise

    • setReducedDebugScreen

      public static void setReducedDebugScreen(boolean reduced)
      Sets if debug screen info should be reduced and send an update packet.
      Parameters:
      reduced - should the player have the reduced debug screen

    • isReducedDebugScreen

      public static boolean isReducedDebugScreen()
      Gets if the player has the reduced debug screen.
      Returns:
      true if the player has the reduced debug screen, false otherwise
